p: Liu et al. reported a clear effect of the initial stoichiometry of the mixture on the product when a mixture of BaH 2 and Al was used as the precursor. The 2:1 and 1:1 mixtures directed the product to Ba 2AlH 7. Meanwhile, a 1:2 mixture directed the product to BaAlH 5 [ 237]. However, none of the mixtures produced a complete reaction.
